About

Hi👋 I am Michael (Hung-Jen) Wang, a student interested in mathematics🔢, computer science🤖, economics💰, and biology🧬. I also love music and am currently listening to Sun In Our Eyes on loop. Please don't hesitate to reach out to me anytime!

Education

I am currently studying Applied Mathematics and Computer Science at Brown University as an undergradudate student. I previously graduated from Hsinchu International School with the class of 2022.
